description.value:
Trigger Your turn ends and you have a status penalty to your Speed or are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]

You flow like water, avoiding all restraints. End one status penalty to your speed, or end one immobilized or slowed condition affecting you.
